decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, then using spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead to bring them back into play for a devastating attack. It also includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo and control the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to win the game through powerful reanimation plays and overwhelming the opponent with high-impact creatures.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly disrupt and control the opponent's mana base using cards like Blood Moon, Magus of the Moon, and Chalice of the Void, while also applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Fury and Pyrogoyf. By limiting the opponent's resources and putting them on the back foot, the deck aims to overwhelm them with powerful threats like Broadside Bombardiers and Sundering Eruption, ultimately securing victory through a combination of disruption and aggression.

This deck aims to quickly cheat out powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Atraxa, Grand Unifier using cards like Show and Tell and Sneak Attack. The deck utilizes countermagic like Force of Will, Flusterstorm, and Spell Pierce to protect its game-winning combos while also running card selection spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to find the necessary pieces. With the ability to bring out big threats early in the game, this deck looks to overwhelm opponents and win through powerful combo plays.
